headline: Mediterranean Zucchini and Chickpea Salad
name: Mediterranean Zucchini and Chickpea Salad
description: This Mediterranean-inspired salad is loaded with chickpeas, oregano, Kalamata olives, tomatoes, feta, and much more for a filling and savory side dish.
recipeIngredient: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
0.5 cup chopped sweet onion (such as Vidalia®)
0.33333334326744 cup packed fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Mix zucchini, chickpeas, tomatoes, red bell pepper, onion, feta, Kalamata olives, olive oil, basil, vinegar, rosemary, capers, garlic, oregano, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl.
